position if he starts his own company well at that point there were very
little m&as so his only hope is to IPO that firm and if he does IPO The Firm
his financial rewards and his social status is about the same as a senior
executive at a a Mitsubishi or a large bank but if it doesn't work well he
doesn't get a second chance he can't get hired into another company and the bankruptcy laws particularly at that
